title: Hextech Glitch?
body: I got 3 key fragments I was going to unlock a crate, but when I clicked unlock, I received nothing upon opening the crate, please help am I lagging or the update glitches crafting?

replies.body: I went ahead and double-checked your account for any missing Hextech keys. It looks like you were able to forge that key and open a chest. If you're still missing some keys that you crafted, it may just be a delay in the client that's preventing it from showing up. Try to close out of the client and reopen it, and that should refresh your inventory!
I have done that and I even played a few games afterwards but there was still no change

When you open chests, you won't necessarily always get a champion or skin shard. If it seems like you're missing items or didn't get anything from the chest you opened, reach out to us in a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to look deeper into that for you.
